## ModelRegistry.getWidth() method

Retrieves the X-axis width of a model for a scale of 1.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getWidth(modelUri: string): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

modelUri


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The URI of the model to retrieve the width for.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

The width of the model.
